mapper.insert: insert into afp(afp_name, afp_price, afp_number, afp_dateForP, afp_manufacturer, afp_shelfLife, afp_adminID, afp_facultyID, afp_isPermited) values (#{afp_name}, #{afp_price}, #{afp_number}, #{afp_dateForP}, #{afp_manufacturer}, #{afp_shelfLife}, #{afp_adminID}, #{afp_facultyID}, #{afp_isPermited})
mapper.update: update afp set afp_name=#{afp_name}, afp_price=#{afp_price}, afp_number=#{afp_number}, afp_dateForP=#{afp_dateForP}, afp_manufacturer=#{afp_manufacturer}, afp_shelfLife=#{afp_shelfLife}, afp_adminID=#{afp_adminID}, afp_facultyID=#{afp_facultyID}, afp_isPermited=#{afp_isPermited} where afp_ID = #{afp_ID}
